description.translate: This is the virtue of the best, because only them achieved the unachievable.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Témérité\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Telle est la vertu des meilleurs, car eux\"}","{\"text\":\"§7seuls atteignirent l'inatteignable.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7This is the virtue of the best, because\"}","{\"text\":\"§7only them achieved the unachievable.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7RES§a1 §7HER§a1 §7LUC§a1\"}"]}}
